description: This file handles authentication-related API interactions, including login, registration, logout, and token status checking.

methods.name: login(username, password)
methods.description: Performs user login by sending credentials to the backend and storing the access token upon success.

methods.name: register({ username, email, password })
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided username, email, and password.

methods.name: logout()
methods.description: Clears stored authentication tokens, effectively logging out the user locally.

methods.name: isAuthenticated()
methods.description: Checks if an authentication token is currently stored, indicating whether the user is logged in.

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^export async function register({ username, email, password }) {$/
